conclusion: Identify the given data and relevant equations: refractive index is sqrt(2), angle of incidence is 45 degrees, find time t for light to travel from O to AB boundary.
Use Snell's Law to find the angle of refraction: theta_2 = 30 degrees.
Determine the path length within the transparent body: d = 2h/sqrt(3).
Calculate the speed of light in the transparent body: v = c/sqrt(2).
Calculate the time t: t = 2h sqrt(6) / 3c.
